title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.3 - Other purposes for procurement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.3 - Other purposes for procurement

State Regulations

Immediately after attack, the State director acting for
the commission may instruct any local director, not involved in the attack, to
purchase, rent or requisition (take) in the name of the State within his own
territory, emergency materials, supplies and equipment for: (a) shipment to an attacked area; (b) the effective maintenance and operation
of civil defense personnel that he is dispatching to an attacked
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
